reviewText: I love the suspense that builds up over the course of an episode of Ghost Hunters, and that's exactly what's missing from this DVD. It's okay--but definitely prefer to watch an entire site visit play out even if nothing happens versus a highlight reel, no matter how cool it may be.
You can't go wrong with Ghost Hunters. I loved it as usual.Ghost Hunters, Volume 2 - Very Best Of
I LOVE!! This show and miss it very much. It gave me a little fix since I can no longer watch it. I can't for Amazon Prime to have this whole series available to watch.
It's not the same as volume one.  This is over priced to the extreme.  Nothing but a complete waste of money.  It's a top 20 moments and lasts about an hour.
I am very satisfied and a great addition to my collection.
This is way too expensive for what it is. I felt cheated after paying $10.
Horrible waste.  So much filler, hardly any hunting, all whining about staff.  Really boring.
